author: VNExplorer
title: Julian Assange’s lawyer says information on CIA assassination plot is ‘credible’
text:
Julian Assange’s lawyer Jennifer Robinson speaks with Sky News host Sharri Markson about “credible” sources’ claims that the CIA planned to kidnap and assassinate Assange.
“This is an outrageous story but one that is support by a Yahoo News investigation, supported by more than 30 government sources, that the Trump administration had in fact planned to kidnap and kill Julian Assange in London,” Ms Robinson told Sky News host Sharri Markson.
Julian Assange’s lawyer says information on CIA assassination plot is ‘credible’
“We have been trying to adduce this evidence in the extradition proceedings showing that this shows the broader persecution of Julian Assange that he’s been targeted because of his political opinions.
“And about our concerns about what will happen to him once extradited to the United States.
“When you have a government that is planning to plot and kill a journalist – an Australian journalist –how can we have any faith in the way they’re going to be treated within the legal system?”

author: Henry Saker-Clark, PA Deputy Business Editor
title: Sky to cut around 2,000 jobs in call centre shake-up
text:
Sky to cut around 2,000 jobs in call centre shake-up
Media company Sky has said around 2,000 jobs are at risk as part of an overhaul of its call centres.
The company, which owned by US media giant Comcast, has said it plans to shut three of its 10 current call centres, in Stockport, Sheffield and central Leeds.
It said around 7% of its overall workforce be affected by the shake-up.
A spokesman for the company said: “We’re transforming our business to deliver quicker, simpler and more digital customer service.
“Our customers increasingly want choice, to speak to us on the phone when they need us most and the ease of managing everyday tasks digitally.
“We’re investing in a new centre of excellence for customer service, alongside cutting-edge digital technology to make our service seamless, reliable, and available 24/7.”

Stay up to date with all the latest news

author: Biola Azeez
title: Kwara Gov greets Christians at Easter
text: Governor Abdulrahman Abdulrazaq of Kwara State has sent felicitations to the Christian community in the state and across Nigeria for the Easter celebration. In a statement by his Chief Press Secretary (CPS), Rafiu Ajakaye, the governor said that Easter evokes the time-tested themes of love, sacrifice, compassion, unity, and the triumph of good over evil at different times. “The sacrifice of Jesus Christ to guide the flock and the enduring legacy he left for humanity call for deeper reflection at this time and always,” the governor says. “He urged citizens to seize the moment to renew their faith in God, unite for national and collective growth, and help one another to uphold goodness and justice in the world. “The Governor wishes the Christian community a happy Easter celebration.”. author: REDACCIÓN SUCESOS
title: Profesor, de 64 años, murió de un infarto mientras conducía su camioneta
text:
En un trágico accidente de tránsito perdió la vida un hombre identificado como Dagoberto Cuello Cuello, quien era docente de profesión y oriundo de San Juan del Cesar, La Guajira, y quien contaba con 64 años. Según los reportes preliminares, el incidente se produjo la mañana de este jueves 19 de diciembre, cuando el reconocido profesional sufrió un infarto mientras conducía su vehículo en compañía de su familia.
Testigos del suceso relataron cómo el vehículo perdió estabilidad de forma repentina antes de colisionar, lo que generó una movilización inmediata de las autoridades y servicios de emergencia. Dagoberto y sus familiares fueron trasladados de urgencia a la clínica Erasmo, en Valledupar, donde lamentablemente se confirmó el fallecimiento del docente. Según los reportes médicos, Cuello Cuello no sufrió heridas graves debido al impacto, pero el infarto resultó fatal, dejando una profunda conmoción en quienes lo conocían. Puede leer aquí: [Capturan a cinco hombres que robaron a turistas en Cartagena](https://www.eluniversal.com.co/sucesos/2024/12/19/cinco-hombres-fueron-capturados-por-robar-a-turistas-en-cartagena/)
Este hecho inesperado provocó que perdiera el control del automóvil, una Toyota Hilux blanca, de placas DML-066, saliéndose de la vía y chocando contra varios árboles en el sector de Río Seco, en la carretera que conecta Los Haticos con Valledupar. Se conoció que Cuello Cuello trabajabaa en el Instituto de Formacion Tecnica Profesional (Infotep) y fue secretario de Gobierno de su pueblo natal.
Afortunadamente, los demás ocupantes del vehículo, pertenecientes a su núcleo familiar, no presentaron lesiones de gravedad y actualmente se encuentran fuera de peligro. Las autoridades pertinentes acudieron al lugar del accidente para realizar las investigaciones correspondientes y determinar los detalles precisos del suceso. Lea también aquí: [Hacían compras de Navidad con tarjetas robadas: capturaron a 2 hermanos](https://www.eluniversal.com.co/sucesos/2024/12/18/hacian-compras-de-navidad-con-tarjetas-robadas-capturaron-a-2-hermanos/)
La noticia ha generado gran pesar en la comunidad de San Juan del Cesar, que lo recuerda como un hombre entregado a su labor profesional y académica.

author: Stoil Stoil
title: Report: Progress in Preventing War in Lebanon
text:
Kuwait’s al-Anbaa newspaper reported on Saturday that significant progress has been made in preventing a potential Israeli war on Lebanon. According to the publication, confidential discussions held outside of Lebanon have nearly succeeded in averting the escalation of the conflict into Lebanon, following confirmations that none of the involved parties desire such a war.
The newspaper highlighted the role of a high-profile individual who effectively leveraged his extensive connections with U.S. President Joe Biden to influence the situation. Al-Anbaa further reported that U.S. envoy Amos Hochstein is expected to revisit Beirut to broaden the scope of negotiations, aiming to reach a consensus on the land border between Israel and Lebanon.
The newspaper underscored the importance of gaining a commitment from Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to adhere to any agreements reached. This commitment is seen as crucial for enabling the return of settlers in northern Israel to their homes and facilitating the return of Lebanese displaced by the conflict to border regions.

author: Edward Bishop
title: Website Creation Simplified: Easy Steps for Beginners
text:
Are you prepared to embark on the exciting journey of creating your own website? The prospect of website creation may initially seem daunting, especially if you are new to the world of web development. However, fear not! With the right guidance and a well-defined plan, you can streamline the process and have your website up and running in no time.
In this article, we will delve into the process of website creation, breaking it down into straightforward steps tailored for beginners. Whether your goal is to start a personal blog, showcase your portfolio, or launch an online store, we’ve got you covered. Let’s dive into the enriching details!
Planning Your Website
Setting Your Goals
Before you dive headfirst into the realm of website creation, it is imperative to clearly define your objectives. What purpose will your website serve? Are you aiming to inform, entertain, sell products, or promote your services? A deep understanding of your goals will serve as a compass guiding your decisions throughout the journey.
Choosing a Domain Name
Your domain name is your online identity, so choose it with utmost care. Ensure it is both relevant to your website’s content and easy to remember. Consider incorporating keywords related to your niche. For instance, if you are creating a website about pet care, a domain such as “PetCarePro.com” is not only memorable but also indicative of your website’s content.
Selecting a Web Hosting Provider
The reliability of your web hosting provider is paramount for optimal website performance. Look for providers that offer high uptime rates, responsive customer support, and scalable options. Notable hosting providers like Bluehost, HostGator, and SiteGround are excellent choices for beginners. Conduct thorough research on their hosting plans to identify one that aligns with your specific needs and budget.
Website Creation Platforms
WordPress
WordPress stands out as a versatile and user-friendly platform, making it an ideal choice for beginners. It offers an extensive array of themes and plugins, simplifying the process of customizing your site. Many hosting providers offer one-click WordPress installations, further streamlining the setup process.
Wix
Wix is renowned for its intuitive drag-and-drop website builder, making it exceptionally user-friendly. It is an excellent option if you desire a visually captivating website without delving into intricate technical details. Explore Wix’s templates to discover one that seamlessly aligns with your website’s unique style.
Squarespace
Squarespace is celebrated for its elegant templates and design-centric approach. It is the perfect choice for those who prioritize aesthetics. When selecting a Squarespace template, focus on one that harmonizes with your brand’s visual identity.
Hocoos AI Website Builder
Hocoos is an
ai website maker that leverages artificial intelligence (AI) to simplify the website creation process. This platform is an excellent choice for beginners and tech-savvy users alike.
Website Design and Development
Picking the Right Template
The template you choose for your website sets the visual tone. Select one that complements your content and aligns with your brand identity. Most website builders offer an array of templates, so take the time to explore your options. For example, if you are launching a fitness blog, seek templates that emphasize health and wellness.
Customizing Your Website
Infuse your website with your unique identity by incorporating elements such as your logo, color palette adjustments, and font customization. Ensure that your design choices reflect your brand identity accurately. For instance, if your brand exudes a playful vibe, employ vibrant colors and playful fonts.
Content Creation
Create content that is of the highest quality, informative, and engaging. Begin with foundational pages like the homepage, about page, and contact page. Seek inspiration by exploring websites within your niche to discern effective strategies. If you are running a cooking blog, craft detailed recipes accompanied by mouthwatering photographs.
Website Optimization
Optimize your website for search engines (SEO) by incorporating relevant keywords, optimizing images, and generating a sitemap. SEO plugins such as Yoast SEO for WordPress can significantly assist in optimizing your content effectively. Conduct research to identify and implement keywords pertinent to your niche. For example, if you operate a travel blog, prioritize keywords like “best travel destinations” or “budget travel tips.”
Adding Functionality
If you are utilizing WordPress, plugins can elevate your website’s functionality. Integrate features such as contact forms, social media integration, and e-commerce capabilities. Notable plugins include:
- Contact Form 7: Ideal for creating customizable contact forms.
- Yoast SEO: A valuable tool for on-page SEO optimization.
- WooCommerce: Essential for setting up an online store.
- Akismet: Shields your website from spam comments.
When selecting plugins, focus on those that cater to the specific needs of your website. If you are an online store owner, prioritize e-commerce plugins. Bloggers should emphasize SEO and social sharing plugins.
Testing Your Website
Before the grand launch, meticulously test your website for functionality and compatibility across various browsers and devices. Vigilantly scan for broken links and ensure that your site loads promptly. Utilize tools such as Google PageSpeed Insights to optimize your website’s loading speed effectively.
Website Launch
Going Live
Once you are content with your website’s design and functionality, it is time to unveil it to the world. Announce your website on social media, share it with friends and family, and commence promoting it within your network. Encourage your network to share your website with their connections, thereby expanding your reach.
Monitoring and Maintenance
Regularly update your content and diligently monitor your website’s performance. Address any issues that arise promptly to maintain a seamless user experience. Consider crafting a content calendar to stay organized and adhere to a consistent posting schedule. Additionally, periodically review your website’s analytics to gain a deeper understanding of your audience, enabling you to tailor your content accordingly.
Conclusion
Creating a website simplified for beginners is an attainable endeavor when you follow a systematic approach. Establish clear goals, select the right tools, and prioritize delivering valuable content to your audience. With unwavering dedication and a commitment to continuous improvement, your website can evolve into a successful online presence.
FAQs (Frequently Asked Questions)
How long does it take to create a website?
The time required for website creation varies depending on complexity. With our simplified guide, you can have a basic website up and running in a few hours. However, more intricate websites may necessitate several weeks or even months for comprehensive development. Patience and dedication are key.
Can I build a website without any technical skills?
Absolutely! Many website builders are user-friendly and require no coding knowledge. Drag-and-drop builders like Wix and Squarespace empower anyone to create a professional-looking website with ease. Take full advantage of their intuitive interfaces.
Do I need to hire a designer or developer?
For basic websites, you can utilize pre-designed templates and embark on a DIY approach. However, for more complex projects or if you desire a highly customized design, engaging a professional designer or developer may prove beneficial. Consider your budget and project scope when making this decision.
What is SEO, and why is it important?
SEO, or Search Engine Optimization, is of utmost importance as it enhances your website’s ranking on search engines, thereby increasing visibility and organic traffic. Effective SEO strategies can significantly boost your website’s prospects for success. Stay informed about SEO best practices to continually enhance your website’s performance.
How do I choose a hosting provider?
Conduct diligent research on hosting providers, taking into account your website’s specific needs. Consider factors such as uptime rates, customer support quality, scalability, and pricing. Many providers offer introductory discounts, so it’s essential to compare options before making a decision. Additionally, read user reviews and seek recommendations from trusted sources.
What is responsive design?
Responsive design ensures that your website adapts seamlessly to various screen sizes and devices, guaranteeing an optimal user experience on smartphones, tablets, and computers. It is indispensable for expanding your reach to a broader audience and improving your website’s SEO rankings. Thoroughly test your website on various devices to confirm its responsiveness.

Cristiano Ronaldo celebra gol 900 marcado em Portugal x Croácia, pela Liga das Nações Imagem: Pedro Nunes/REUTERS A seleção de Portugal venceu a Croácia por 2 a 1 no jogo de abertura da fase de grupos da Liga das Nações. A partida aconteceu no Estádio da Luz, em Lisboa.
Cristiano Ronaldo marcou o gol de número 900 da carreira. Após passar em branco na Eurocopa, o CR7 fez o segundo do jogo. Dalot marcou o primeiro, e ainda fez um contra para a Croácia.
O próximo adversário dos portugueses é a Escócia, enquanto os croatas enfrentam a Polônia. Os dois jogos da segunda rodada acontecem no domingo (8).
Josias de Souza
Em meio à divinização das pesquisas, somem ideias
Mariana Grilli
Algodão brasileiro quer mais espaço na Ásia
Casagrande
Lesão é fatalidade, e Pedro voltará ainda mais forte
Matheus Pichonelli
Pablo Marçal busca voto na base do estereótipo
Como foi o jogo Noite especial para os portugueses. O clima no Estádio da Luz já era marcante antes mesmo da bola rolar. O ex-zagueiro Pepe, que anunciou a aposentadoria em agosto, foi homenageado pela torcida e pela Federação Portuguesa de Futebol com um bandeirão tridimensional e uma camisa comemorativa. A festa continuou com um gol cedo de Dalot para deixar Portugal na frente.
Classificação e jogos Liga das Nações Novecentos. O momento era ideal para Cristiano Ronaldo voltar a marcar pela seleção nacional. Quando o gol saiu, o ídolo e capitão português não escondeu a emoção e se ajoelhou no gramado com as mãos no rosto. O atacante, que é o maior artilheiro do futebol em jogos oficiais, havia marcado pela última vez com a camisa de Portugal em amistoso contra a Irlanda, disputado em junho.
Dalot faz contra. Antes do intervalo, a Croácia conseguiu frear a empolgação portuguesa ao diminuir a diferença no placar. Após inversão de jogo dentro da área, Dalot tentou evitar um chute de Sosa mas acabou mandando contra a própria meta.
Segundo tempo esfria. Portugal ficou mais perto de ampliar do que a Croácia do empate. Cristiano quase deixou mais um, mas acabou parando em ótima defesa do goleiro Livakovic. O veterano croata Modric, que também começou como titular e capitão, acabou sendo substituído após uma atuação discreta.
Gols e destaques 1x0. Aos 6 minutos do primeiro tempo, Bruno Fernandes encontrou passe no meio da área para Dalot, que surpreendeu a zaga e finalizou de canhota, no meio das pernas de Livakovic, abrindo o placar.
Continua após a publicidade Relacionadas Cristiano Ronaldo marca para Portugal, faz seu 900º gol e se emociona Com lesão na coxa, Militão é cortado da seleção nas Eliminatórias Vini Jr. tem chance na Bola de Ouro? Clima na Europa piorou, diz jornalista Trabalha o goleiro. Cristiano Ronaldo teve grande chance de gol aos 21 minutos em finalização forte buscando o canto. Livakovic esticou a perna para fazer uma defesa de handball e tirar para escanteio.
2x0. 900 vezes Cristiano Ronaldo! Aos 33 minutos, após cruzamento de Nuno Mendes da intermediária, o craque português apareceu na área e tocou de primeira, de perna direita, para concluir um gol histórico em Lisboa.
2x1. Aos 41 minutos, Sosa finalizou de dentro da área após bola invertida de Kramaric. Dalot tentou tirar, mas pegou mal de calcanhar e acabou marcando contra.
Evitou o 901º. Aos 16 minutos do segundo tempo, Bruno Fernandes tocou para chega de Cristiano Ronaldo, que bateu forte. Livakovic fez grande defesa.
Comunicar erro Veja também Deixe seu comentário Só para assinantes

author: @WNDU
title: Dementia summit in South Bend provides a range of topics for dementia care
text: Dementia summit in South Bend provides a range of topics for dementia care SOUTH BEND, Ind. (WNDU) - A two-day summit in South Bend was devoted to innovations in the care of dementia patients. About 300 caregivers from throughout the Midwest attended the two-day gathering that wrapped up Thursday at the Ribbon Town Event Center. Topics ranged from the use of rhythmic drumming to reducing stress and anxiety. They included the use of housing models for dementia patients that are less institutional. “People with dementia are able to do so much more but we try to keep them safe in a locked unit. While I say that locked units is unsafe because people do not walk enough, they do not exercise enough they do not socialize enough so you should unlock and look at safety and risks in a different way,” said Eloy Van Hal, from the Hogeweyk an assisted living facility. “All people with dementia will die in a few years, so the question is how you want to live in those last years of life.” There was also a V-I-P party at Milton Village which is a South Bend facility that employs the Dementia Village concept.
